{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Linksys |model=WRTSL54GS |revision= |upc=745883564996 |ean= |asin=B000E5E868 |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=10/12/2005 |manuf_country= |manuf=CyberTAN |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=Q87-WTSLGS |ic_id=3839A-WTSLGS |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM4704 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Intel |fla1_model=TE28F640 |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=HY5DU561622DT-J |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4318E |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Broadcom |sw_model=BCM5325F |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware=DD-WRT,OpenWrt,TomatoUSB,Tomato |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user= |default_pass=admin |oui= |oui_eth= |default_ch= }} ''Wireless-G Media Storage Link Router with SpeedBooster''
{{SupportPage|vendor=Linksys|model=WRTSL54GS}} Serial numbers may start with CJK0 and CJK1. There may be multiple revisions of this device. [http://svn.dd-wrt.com/changeset/3348 DD-WRT Trac states the device uses BCM5325E], FCC photos show BCM5325F, OpenWrt wiki states BCM5325F There is a NEC USB 2.0 controller on-board. [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Linksys_WRT54G_series WRT54G series on Wikipedia]
[http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/linksys/wrtsl54gs On the OpenWrt wiki]
[http://www.dd-wrt.com/wiki/index.php/Linksys_WRTSL54GS On the DD-WRT wiki]
